meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Holden Muhammad Meigooni Kerry Lambeth Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4481.

td.p: Chris Holden, a senior from Carlisle, Pennsylvania
Muhammad Meigooni, a senior from Springfield, Illinois
Kerry Lambeth, a senior from Tualitin, Oregon

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE 101
SANDWICHES
NOT OUR CONSTITUTION
READ THE MAP
TV TEEN DRAMAS
AN ABBREVIATED CATEGORY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A passage from "A Midsummer Night\'s Dream" alludes to this real-life queen as "a fair vestal"')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: No, we\'re talking about [*]. They both sign their names a number of times, and then they pick one, and it gets engraved on [Alex pulls some money from his pocket]... your money.)
MuhammadWhat is the President Pro Tempore?
$7,000
KerryWhat be President of the United States?
$7,800
ChrisWhat is a Supreme Court Justice?
$500
U.S. Treasurer or U.S. Treasury Secretary')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In this job, after the Senate confirms you, you sign your name at least 5 times, then pick one to be engraved')

tr.td: JOBS
In this job, after the Senate confirms you, you sign your name at least 5 times, then pick one to be engraved
Kerry
Muhammad
Chris
3rd place: $5,000
2nd place: $5,000
Finalist
Kerry
Muhammad
Chris

18 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
